mapper.select: SELECT oc.uuid, oc.order_num, tc.uuid as caseUuid, tc.title, tc.made_time, tc.fault_desc, tc.idea_process, tc.summary, tc.amt as materialsExpenses, oc.order_sts, oc.created_time, oc.car_owner_mobile FROM order_case oc LEFT JOIN order_case_detail ocd ON oc.uuid = ocd.order_uuid LEFT JOIN technician_case tc ON tc.uuid = ocd.case_uuid WHERE oc.sts = 0 AND oc.uuid = #{uuid}
select count(*) from order_case where technician_uuid = #{uuid} and sts = 0 and order_sts != 0
select count(*) from order_case where car_owner_uuid = #{uuid} and sts = 0 and order_sts != 0
